name: Innyde
culture_notes: Coastal Tongue base with Riveric loanwords
evening tide-ceremonies and small ancestor altars
navigation rituals integrated into daily work
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
navigational auguries cannot replace charts or seamanship
notes: built on mangrove stilts; harbor only safe at high tide
small outpost reliant on seasonal trade and passing ships
